Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Grants sales and use tax exemption for certain tangible personal property and services used in the operation of recreational skiing facilities
Summary: Grants sales and use tax exemptions for certain tangible personal property and services used in the operation of recreational skiing facilities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to granting sales and compensating use tax exemptions for certain tangible personal property and services used in the operation of recreational skiing facilities
